languages.text: "Не проповедуй мне о букве Лекс Империалис, сыне, — в чем вера, если ты знаешь только написанное? В чем добродетель, если ты закрываешь глаза на вопиющие пороки? Подумай об этом, если ты еще не возгордился настолько, чтобы ставить своды законов выше Имперского кредо".

"Do not preach to me about the letter of the Lex Imperialis. What is faith worth if one knows only that which is written? What good is virtue if one turns a blind eye to odious vices? Reflect on this, if you are not yet so lost to hubris as to put collections of statutes above the Imperial Creed."
languages.original_text: "Не проповедуй мне о букве Лекс Империалис, сыне, — в чем вера, если ты знаешь только написанное? В чем добродетель, если ты закрываешь глаза на вопиющие пороки? Подумай об этом, если ты еще не возгордился настолько, чтобы ставить своды законов выше Имперского кредо".

What good is virtue if one turns a blind eye to odious vices? Reflect on this, if you are not yet so lost to hubris as to put collections of statutes above the Imperial Creed."

"Do not preach to me about the letter of the Lex Imperialis. What is faith worth if one knows only that which is written? What good is virtue if one turns a blind eye to odious vices? Reflect on this, if you are not yet so lost to hubris as to put collections of statutes above the Imperial Creed."

languages.text: “别和我宣扬《帝国法典》那些条条框框了。如果一个人只相信写在纸上的条款，那信仰还有什么价值？如果一个人对可鄙的恶习视而不见，那美德还有什么作用？如果你还没狂妄到把那些文字视为圣典，以为它可以凌驾于帝国信仰之上，那你还是好好思考思考吧。”
languages.original_text: "Do not preach to me about the letter of the Lex Imperialis. What is faith worth if one knows only that which is written? What good is virtue if one turns a blind eye to odious vices? Reflect on this, if you are not yet so lost to hubris as to put collections of statutes above the Imperial Creed."

traits.locale_text: “别和我宣扬《帝国法典》那些条条框框了。如果一个人只相信写在纸上的条款，那信仰还有什么价值？如果一个人对可鄙的恶习视而不见，那美德还有什么作用？如果你还没狂妄到把那些文字视为圣典，以为它可以凌驾于帝国信仰之上，那你还是好好思考思考吧。”

languages.text: «No me hable de la textualidad de la Lex Imperialis. ¿De qué sirve la fe cuando solo se conoce lo que está escrito? ¿De qué sirve la virtud si se aparta la mirada de los vicios odiosos? Piénselo, si aún no se ha perdido tanto en la arrogancia como para valorar los estatutos por encima del Credo imperial».
languages.original_text: "Do not preach to me about the letter of the Lex Imperialis. What is faith worth if one knows only that which is written? What good is virtue if one turns a blind eye to odious vices? Reflect on this, if you are not yet so lost to hubris as to put collections of statutes above the Imperial Creed."

traits.locale_text: «No me hable de la textualidad de la Lex Imperialis. ¿De qué sirve la fe cuando solo se conoce lo que está escrito? ¿De qué sirve la virtud si se aparta la mirada de los vicios odiosos? Piénselo, si aún no se ha perdido tanto en la arrogancia como para valorar los estatutos por encima del Credo imperial».

languages.text: « N'essayez pas de me sermonner au sujet de la Lex Imperialis. Que vaut la foi si l'on ne connaît que ce qui est écrit ? À quoi sert la vertu si l'on ferme les yeux sur des vices odieux ? Réfléchissez à tout cela, si vous n'avez pas encore cédé à l'orgueil au point de placer des lois au-dessus du Credo Impérial. »
languages.original_text: "Do not preach to me about the letter of the Lex Imperialis. What is faith worth if one knows only that which is written? What good is virtue if one turns a blind eye to odious vices? Reflect on this, if you are not yet so lost to hubris as to put collections of statutes above the Imperial Creed."

traits.locale_text: « N'essayez pas de me sermonner au sujet de la Lex Imperialis. Que vaut la foi si l'on ne connaît que ce qui est écrit ? À quoi sert la vertu si l'on ferme les yeux sur des vices odieux ? Réfléchissez à tout cela, si vous n'avez pas encore cédé à l'orgueil au point de placer des lois au-dessus du Credo Impérial. »

languages.text: 「レックス・インペリアの文言について私に説教するな。書かれていることだけを知っていても、信仰に何の価値がある？忌まわしい悪徳を見て見ぬふりをする美徳に何の意味がある？もしまだ驕り高ぶって法典の条文を帝国信条集より優先していないのなら、よく考えるがよい」
languages.original_text: "Do not preach to me about the letter of the Lex Imperialis. What is faith worth if one knows only that which is written? What good is virtue if one turns a blind eye to odious vices? Reflect on this, if you are not yet so lost to hubris as to put collections of statutes above the Imperial Creed."

traits.locale_text: 「レックス・インペリアの文言について私に説教するな。書かれていることだけを知っていても、信仰に何の価値がある？忌まわしい悪徳を見て見ぬふりをする美徳に何の意味がある？もしまだ驕り高ぶって法典の条文を帝国信条集より優先していないのなら、よく考えるがよい」

languages.text: "Bana Lex İmperialis mektubuyla ilgili ders vermeye kalkışma. Kişi kaderinde yazanı biliyorsa inancın ne değeri var? İğrenç kötülüklere göz yumuyorsa erdemin ne faydası var? İmparatorluk İtikadı'nın üzerine heykeller dizecek kadar kibrine yenilmediysen bunları bir düşün."
languages.original_text: "Do not preach to me about the letter of the Lex Imperialis. What is faith worth if one knows only that which is written? What good is virtue if one turns a blind eye to odious vices? Reflect on this, if you are not yet so lost to hubris as to put collections of statutes above the Imperial Creed."

traits.locale_text: "Bana Lex İmperialis mektubuyla ilgili ders vermeye kalkışma. Kişi kaderinde yazanı biliyorsa inancın ne değeri var? Kişi iğrenç kötülüklere göz yumuyorsa erdemin ne faydası var? İmparatorluk İtikadı'nın üzerine heykeller dizecek kadar kibrine yenilmediysen bunları bir düşün."

languages.text: "Haltet mir keine Predigt über die Worte des Lex Imperia. Welchen Wert hat Glauben, wenn er nur aus dem besteht, was niedergeschrieben ist? Was nützt Tugend, wenn man gleichzeitig verkommene Laster geflissentlich übersieht? Denkt darüber nach, falls Ihr dem Hochmut noch nicht so weit erlegen seid, dass Ihr Sammlungen von Statuen über den Imperialen Glauben stellt."
languages.original_text: "Do not preach to me about the letter of the Lex Imperialis. What is faith worth if one knows only that which is written? What good is virtue if one turns a blind eye to odious vices? Reflect on this, if you are not yet so lost to hubris as to put collections of statutes above the Imperial Creed."

Was nützt Tugend, wenn man gleichzeitig verkommene Laster geflissentlich übersieht? Denkt darüber nach, falls Ihr dem Hochmut noch nicht so weit erlegen seid, dass Ihr Sammlungen von Statuen über den Imperialen Glauben stellt."
